tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (JJ Special)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ special) (NN someone)) (PP (IN at) (NP (NNS @blindboys)))))) (NP (NP (NNP Christmas) (NNP Show)) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (NNP Wednesday) (, ,) (NNP December)) (JJ 14th)))) (. !)))
